review: I hardly ever write reviews but I felt compelled to for this product. I want to love the Roku streaming stick, however I just can't. I want to throw the remote though my tv on a nightly basis. It is a constant struggle to get to remote to pair with the unit. I will spend days trying to get the remote to work only to have it quit working a day or two later. Yes I know there is an app that you can use to control it from your phone or tablet but it is really a pain to have to do so. Also recently Netflix started acting up with the sound. I know it's not Netflix as I can watch the same show/episode on our 2nd tv via the netflix app on the Amazon fire stick with no issues. So sad as I really prefer the Roku interface over others but the remote ruins it all for me. My niece also received this as a Christmas gift from her parents and tonight I had to show them how to try and re-pair the remote. After only 3 weeks of use! Incredibly frustrating for both children and adults. Buyer beware!
